ants.bot
Class AbstractSystemInputReader

java.lang.Object
  ants.bot.AbstractSystemInputReader
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractSystemInputParser
public abstract class AbstractSystemInputReader
extends java.lang.Object

Handles system input stream reading.

abstract  void processLine(java.lang.String line)
          Process a line read out by readSystemInput() method in a way defined by subclass implementation.

          Reads system input stream line by line.

Constructor Detail

AbstractSystemInputReader

public AbstractSystemInputReader()
Method Detail

readSystemInput

public void readSystemInput()
                     throws java.io.IOException
Reads system input stream line by line. All characters are converted to lower case and each line is passed for processing to processLine(String) method.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

processLine

public abstract void processLine(java.lang.String line)
Process a line read out by readSystemInput() method in a way defined by subclass implementation.

Parameters:
line - single, trimmed line of system input
